videohandler

Class MediaControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • videohandler.MediaControl

  • public class MediaControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Programmer: Roger Tan & Zayyad Tagwai Date Created: 01/03/2014 Description: Class that creates a control bar that is overlaid on the video. Functionality is play/pause, stop, scrubbing bar, volume slider, and fullscreen mode with same.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  MediaControl.ShowTask
      Calls run() to make the shape appear visible after the set delay and then disappear after its set duration

    • Constructor Detail

      • MediaControl

        public MediaControl(javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer mp,
            java.lang.Integer width,
            java.lang.Integer height,
            java.lang.Boolean loop,
            double startTime,
            double duration2)
        Constructor for the MediaControl class. Accepts optional parameters from PWS. Creates a visual control bar with a play/pause button, a stop button, and a fullscreen button, which is overlayed onto the MediaPlayer. Also handles entering into the fullscreen viewing mode.
        Parameters:
        mp - The MediaPlayer object instantiated by the VideoHandler class
        width - The PWS optional width for the MediaPlayer
        height - The PWS optional height for the MediaPlayer
        loop - The PWS optional loop value for the video
        startTime - The PWS optional startTime to delay the video starting to play

        Date Modified: 11 Jun 2014
